name: Amazon Titan Text Premier
description: Large language model for text generation with 32K context window for open-ended and context-based tasks

skills.name: Text Generation
skills.description: Generate coherent and contextually relevant text based on input prompts
examples: Write a creative story about space exploration
Draft a professional email to a client
Generate a product description for marketing

skills.name: Content Summarization
skills.description: Create concise summaries of longer texts while preserving key information
examples: Summarize this research paper on climate change
Create a brief summary of this meeting transcript
Provide a concise overview of this news article

skills.name: Code Generation
skills.description: Generate code snippets and programming solutions
examples: Write a Python function to sort a list
Create a JavaScript function to validate email addresses
Generate HTML/CSS for a responsive navbar

skills.name: Chain of Thought Reasoning
skills.description: Solve complex problems using step-by-step reasoning
examples: Solve this math word problem step by step
Explain the logical process to debug this code issue
Walk through the reasoning for this economic forecast
